metadata.Title: CVE-2022-30632 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Uncontrolled recursion in Glob in path/filepath before Go 1.17.12 and Go 1.18.4 allows an attacker to cause a panic due to stack exhaustion via a path containing a large number of path separators.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-30632` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.18 - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~18.04.4
golang-1.18-go - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~18.04.4
golang-1.18-src - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~18.04.4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: golang-1.18 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.18.1-1ubuntu1~18.04.4').
